2019.title: Introduction to chmod
2019.description: A Unix/Linux command to change the access permissions of Files and Directories, How I learnt about it. How can you use it and where will you use it

2019.title: Best Linux Distribution of all time
2019.description: The Best and Easiest GNU/Linux Distribution of All time, I thought about it for quite a while, The answer might as well surprise you and change the way you think
